attributes.action: Keeps Gyms Open During November 5th - December 2nd London Lockdown 2020.
attributes.additional_details: Keeping gyms open provides people to live a healthy lifestyle though out lockdown many of people have gained weight with high readings of BMI and put on more and more pounds, people are at risk of diabetes due to eating unhealthy or over eating for comfort, gym allows us to stay fit and helps us relief stress as go in to lockdown, gyms have put safety measures to ensure the environment is safe capping gym capacity of how many people are allowed in at one time, sanitation of hands.
attributes.background: Being a regular gym goer and having issues with mental health gym has been the relief for my stress on all levels.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
